title: I want to know when the horrible customer service ends,.. And why aren't more people aware?
content: I have had to since switch phone carriers and buy a new phone even though mine was under warranty! You have accused me of lying.. Hiding things in pictures.. It's been 7 days since you said "ok we can see you didn't lie (no apology mind you) we will replace.. 7 days filled with one bit of information request at a time... Per day. As if your playing with me further? People need these phones for work.. For life.. And your creating a mockery of of us.. I will take this as far as I have to this isn't right or professional in any way and you haven't even picked my phone up yet,.. I can only imagine what still lies.. Screenshots starting from the ok you didn't lie... To now with dates... And playing with me
